Wallet bag in lily-print Dauphine calfskin embellished by 3D embroidery with painted resin and hand-applied crystal details. It features solid-color sides and placed embellishment that recreates the perfect symmetry of the design. Thanks to the detachable chain, it can be worn crossbody or carried as a handbag
